Am sure this is a simple fix but one of our students has the "object" Simon Cowell in their game. When they go into the room it says "You can see a Simon Cowell". 

As far as I am aware there is only one Simon Cowell and she would like to remove the "a" so it just says "You can see Simon Cowell"

Can it be done? 

Many thanks
